meaning_str.bing:
n. 视野；视力；异象；想象
v. 在梦(幻)中看见；想像
网络. 愿景；视觉；远见

视力；视野；洞察力；远见；预见；幻觉；想象力；构想；展望；理想；设想
设想；展望；幻想；预见；憧憬；想象；构想；预想

1.en: I had so long viewed the world with external vision only, and so had been unable to see its universal aspect of joy.
1.cn: 我很长时间只从外在的幻象来观察世界，因此我看不到快乐的全部。

2.en: Our souls are sparks of light, the little twinkling lights you see from time to time out of the periphery of your of field of vision.
2.cn: 我们的灵魂是光的火花，你有时看见的来自你视野外小小闪光。

3.en: Christine and the phantom of the feelings of love than raul shall, from her eyes with the phantom of the blurred vision can see.
3.cn: 克丽丝汀对魅影的感情也应当远比对劳尔的爱情深刻，这从她与魅影对视时的迷离眼光中就可以看出。

0.en: To help you focus, norepinephrine creates a sort of tunnel vision, blocking out surrounding distractions, possibly even warping your sense of time, and enhancing your memory.
0.cn: 为了让你能专注，去甲肾上腺素制造出隧道视觉的效果，遮蔽周遭让你分心的东西，可能甚至冻结你的时间感，增强你的记忆力。

1.en: I don't want a version. I want a vision.
1.cn: 我不要折中，我要大展宏图。

2.en: Not height, vision, athleticism, or ability to digest dairy products.
2.cn: 绝非在身高，视力，运动能力或消化乳制品这几个领域吧。

4.en: I have to go. No, Vision. Vision, if that's true, then maybe going isn't the best idea. Wanda, I... Vision!
4.cn: 我得走了。不，幻视。幻视，如果那是真的，那也许回去不是最好的选择。旺达，我... 幻视！

5.en: Master, your vision your vision was right. Tai Lung has broken out of prison. He's on his way.
5.cn: 真人 你的预感成真了，太狼越狱了 他正朝这儿来。

6.en: It's safe with the Vision. These days safe is in short supply.
6.cn: 它在幻视手里是安全的，如今安全也是一种奢侈了。

7.en: Perhaps the Goddess of Mercy is sparing him a far worse vision.
7.cn: 也许观世音菩萨是不想让他看到更可怕的未来。

8.en: The Khan is your divine conduit? No. He is merely a man with a vision.
8.cn: 大汗是你的神咯？不，大汗只是一个有远见的普通人。

9.en: I mean, what is immortality? In time, even Grant's vision will get old.
9.cn: 永生究竟是什么？过个几十年格兰特的设想也会过时。

10.en: Thank you, Ed. I'd like to present the Board my vision for the future of Apple.
10.cn: 谢谢你，埃德，我很高兴能跟董事会描述一下苹果的未来

11.en: Yeah, okay. Let me just grab my night-vision goggles and my stun gun. I got them.
11.cn: 好的，我得先去拿我的夜视镜和眩晕枪。我这儿有。

12.en: Her vision and ours will be realized. A free Panem. With self-determination for all.
12.cn: 她和我们的目标终将实现，那将是一个自由的施惠国，人人独立自主。

13.en: If you don't share our enthusiasm, and care for the vision of this company, get out.
13.cn: 如果你不能和我们共同感受到那份热忱，也不关心公司的前景，滚出去。

14.en: The Avengers can not defeat Ultron. Not alone. Why does your vision sound like Jarvis?
14.cn: 复仇者无法打败奥创，你们不会孤身奋战。为什么你的幻视听上去像贾维斯？

15.en: Marcus used me to design weapons, to help him realize his vision of a militarized Starfleet.
15.cn: 马库斯利用我设计武器，来帮助他实现使舰队军事化的愿望。

16.en: What do you mean? Two weeks ago, Vision turned off his transponder. He's offline. What? Yeah.
16.cn: 什么意思？两周前，幻视关闭了他的应答机。他下线了。什么？嗯。

17.en: Parisians are still debating whether this radical design is the vision of a madman or a genius!
17.cn: 对于这建筑的极端设计，究竟是出自疯子还是天才之手，巴黎人至今仍争论不休！

18.en: She was extremely valuable to you rebellion. Because you have no vision, no true leader among you.
18.cn: 对反叛军来说当然很有意义，因为你们没有远见，没有真正的首领。

19.en: Vision, are you not letting me leave? It is a question of safety. I can protect myself. Not yours.
19.cn: 幻视，你是不让我离开吗？是为了安全起见。我能保护自己。不是你的安全。
